r <- map(mixed.lmers, difflsmeans) %>%
    map(r, function(x){
    r <- x %>%
      mutate(p = `Pr(>|t|)`,
             star = case_when(p < 0.001 ~ "***",
                                              p < 0.01 ~ "**",
                                              p < 0.05 ~ "*",
                                              p < 0.1 ~ ".", 
                                              TRUE ~ ""),
             res = paste0(Estimate, star)) %>%
      select(res)
    #colnames(r) <- c(name(x))
    return(r)
  })
